name: Going Postal with Dick Danger
description:
MAKE SURE TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

Aliens have taken over the postal office! It is up to you, Dick Danger, to infiltrate and destroy the menace with the help of your trusty box.

Controls
Aim/Shoot: Mouse
Take Cover: W key
Pause: ESC

Shoot the red and green switches to change the direction of the conveyor belts.

Made for Ludum Dare 47.

NOTE: Update Oct. 6 for a bug fix.

Music/FX: Christopher William McEwan

Art: Jordan Jenkins

Programming: Michael Wahba
